verses.name: Judges 3:21
verses.text: And Ehud put forth his left hand, and took the dagger from his right thigh, and thrust it into his belly:

verses.name: Judges 3:22
verses.text: And the haft also went in after the blade; and the fat closed upon the blade, so that he could not draw the dagger out of his belly; and the dirt came out.

verses.name: Judges 3:23
verses.text: Then Ehud went forth through the porch, and shut the doors of the parlour upon him, and locked them.
